author: donaldp
msg: Move phoenix descriptor to phoenix CVS

author: donaldp
msg: Use -f to indicate build file rather than -buildfile so as to be compatible with myrmidon.

author: donaldp
msg: Make it possible to plug in the name of main ant class by setting an xslt variable.

author: donaldp
msg: Remvoe path from "Missing prereq" message to screcard as it makes it difficult to track ant runs if they are in different hierarchies.

author: donaldp
msg: Add in the notion of a "scorecard" that tracks results of all the runs in a simple flat file. Ideal for diffing to compare differences between two ant runs.
